title: CNN President Jeff Zucker resigns over consensual relationship with key lieutenant - CNN
content:
1. CNN President Jeff Zucker resigns over consensual relationship with key lieutenant  CNN
  2. Jeff Zucker out at CNN after failing to disclose ‘consensual relationship’ with colleague: ‘I was wrong’  Fox News
  3. Jeff Zucker Resigns From CNN After Relationship With Top Executive  The New York Times
  4. The truth about Jeff Zucker’s CNN resignation isn’t what conservatives want you to believe  The Independent
  5. President of CNN Jeff Zucker resigns  CNN
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: CNN Worldwide president Jeff Zucker, the influential news executive who reshaped the iconic network, announced Wednesday morning that he has resigned from his position effective immediately.
